Spire:

"Don't be so harsh, Jottunn, darling"said Lady spire with a smile"W=
hen was the last time that we faced those Unicronians???? I can bet that Ra=
zorwing didn't expect that they were tougher than last time... I wonder if =
all those time they have waitting for reforces... or they have reforces amo=
ng the lost ones..."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 18, 2005 9:45 PM
  Subject: R=
e: Towards the Meeting:


  Before the Maximal Lord could reply anything, s=
omeone intervened.

  Jotunn: She is right, Razorwing. Why have you kept th=
e fun for
  yourself? The destruction of the orbital is now your fault...

=
  Jotunn's massive form was standing in the doorway as it closed. He
  move=
d a bit towards the table.

  Jotunn: So? What do you say?

  Razorwing gav=
e him a piercing gaze and invited them both to sit down.

  Razorwing: I di=
d what had to be done. What did you do? Did you even
  have ships to send y=
our troops?

  Jotunn clenched his jaw, but said nothing, then turned to Sp=
ire.
